$:/showInfo/search/SystemImage.text:
List of all system images (ie, tiddlers tagged {{$:/tags/Image||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}}). Click on an icon to copy its title !

<$vars
search-list="[[$:/tags/Image]tagging[]]  {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/search-images/add-image-filter}}"
item-template="$:/showInfo/search/img"
list-class=""
list-style="""padding:0; """
>
{{{[<item-template>is[blank]then[$:/showInfo/search/list/titles]else<item-template>]}}}
{{$:/showInfo/search/template}}
</$vars>
$:/showInfo/search/SystemImage.title: $:/showInfo/search/SystemImage
$:/showInfo/search/SystemImage.caption: {{$:/core/images/picture}} Images

$:/showInfo/search/img.title: $:/showInfo/search/img
$:/showInfo/search/img.text:
<$button message="tm-copy-to-clipboard" param=<<item>> class="tc-btn-invisible search-list-img" tooltip=<<item>>>
<$transclude tiddler=<<item>>/>
</$button>

$:/showInfo/search/img/style.title: $:/showInfo/search/img/style

$:/showInfo/search/template.title: $:/showInfo/search/template
$:/showInfo/search/template.description: See $:/showInfo/search/SystemImage for an example of how to use this template.
$:/showInfo/search/template.text:
<$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" tag="input" default="" placeholder={{$:/showInfo/search/placeholder}} class="tc-edit-texteditor"/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="cancel search"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=""/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="advanced search"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="text" $subfilter="+[toggle[yes],[no]]"/> {{$:/core/images/advanced-search-button}}
<$reveal default={{{ [[$:/temp/advanced-search/show]addsuffixget[text]] }}} type="match" text="yes">

Advanced search

<$edit-text tiddler=<> field="text" tag="input" default="[search:[]]" placeholder="write an additional filter here" class="tc-edit-texteditor"/> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="[search:[]]"/> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
<$set name=search tiddler=<> field="text"> <$set name=filter tiddler=<> field="text"> <$set name=filter value={{{ [match[]then[+]else] }}}>
    > style=<> > <$list filter="[subfilterfilter]+[search:*]" variable="item" template={{{ [is[blank]then[$:/showInfo/search/titles]else] }}} />

$:/showInfo/search/SystemImage/search/st.title: $:/showInfo/search/SystemImage/search/style
$:/showInfo/search/SystemImage/search/st.text:
<pre>
.search-list-container {
display:flex;
align-items: center;
}

.search-list-container button {
padding:.5em;
}

.system-image-search svg {

fill:<<color foreground>>;

}

.tc-edit-texteditor {
  width:100%;
	padding: 3px 3px 3px 3px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(63, 63, 63);
	line-height: 1.3em;
	-webkit-appearance: none;
}
